            Bio
            Fahim Ahmed studies vehicle routing problem and their applications in supply chain logistics at UofSCTransportation Group. His research focuses on real-time vehicle routing planning under disruption scenrios. He works in a reasearch group at UofSC that frequently collaborates with researchers who studies transportation aspects of the supply chain logistics.
            
            
            Education
            University of South Carolina (UofSC) | Columbia, SC
            Ph.D. in Civil Engineering (Transportation/Logistics) | August 2015 - Present
            M.S. in Civil Engineering | August 2015 - May 2018
            Bangladesh University of Engineering & Technology (BUET) | Dhaka, BD
            B.Sc. in Civil Engineering | January 2009 - July 2014
            
            
            Experience
            UofSCTransportation Group | Advisor: Dr. Nathan Huynh | August 2015 - Present
            CEE, UofSC | Instructor | Spring 2020, Fall 2020, Spring 2021
